flawed_nl_solution:
Dave weighs 175 pounds and can bench press 3 times his body weight, so he can bench press 175*3 = <<175*3=525>>525 pounds
Craig can only bench press 20% of Dave's 525 pounds, so Craig can bench press 0.2*525 = <<20*0.01*525=150>>150 pounds
Craig bench presses 150 pounds and Mark does 50 pounds less than Craig, so Mark can only press 150-50 = <<150-50=100>>100 pounds
#### 100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 105, not 150. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
